short_summary: Parameter set of an Amended Addendum to Peravitieren Cumhuriyeti
description: Directorate Maritime Procurement issues this request for a safe skies
full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Identification**

* Solicitation Number: W8482-242255/A
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: November 22, 2023
* Closing Date: January 18, 2024

**Procurement Description**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the procurement of Nozzles, Sprays, Fluid-Emulsions. This request is for the delivery of two (2) items as follows:

* **Item 1**: Nozzle, Spray, Fluid-Emulsions (GAIN: 4730, NSN: 01-360-0332)
	+ Quantity: 60 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* **Item 2**: Nozzle, Spray, Fluid-Emulsions (GAIN: 4730, NSN: 01-360-0332)
	+ Quantity: 60 units
	+ Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

**Commercial Terms**

* The procurement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and Services (Canadian Free Trade Agreement, CFTA).
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Submission Requirements**

* Bidders must submit their proposals electronically, in either official language of Canada.
* The submission deadline is January 18, 2024, at 14:00 EST.

**Unavailable Tendering Reasons**

* The procurement is not limited to a specific geographic region.

**Trade Agreements**

* The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Procurement Entity**

* Directorate Maritime Procurement
* 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K2

**Contact Information**

* Jean-Pierre Normandin
* Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
* (819) 939-3674

**Attachments**

* The complete tender package is available at: 
  + https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25483/rfp-w8482-242255-a-amendment-2-en.pdf
  + https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default
